<DOMAIN>PUBLIC-RELATIONS</DOMAIN>
<RESUME_START>
ACCOUNT REPRESENTATIVE
Professional Summary
I am a social media and public relations professional, experienced in creating direct-to-consumer and internal communications for global brands.
I am also the founder of @Wandering_for_Eats, a foodie Instagram brand with over 3.5k followers and multiple partnerships with local businesses in Hudson County, New Jersey.

SKILLS

Social Media Strategy Digital Marketing Content Development Copywriting Photo Editing Microsoft Office Suite Ads C Content Content Development Copywriting Client Delivery Email Finance Financial Leadership Letters
Marketing strategy Marketing Materials Meetings Microsoft Office Suite Network Photo Editing Profit Proposals Quick Recruitment Research Sales Stories Strategy Television Articles
Work History

04/2016 to Current
Company Name
Organically increased Instagram following over 200% from 1k to 3.5k in the past four months, and achieved an average engagement rate of 12.2%.
Continuously growing followers by optimizing my social media strategy.
Collaborate with brands and local restaurants on sponsored posts, including creating content and copy, photo editing, and quick and informative engagement with the audience of each post.
Produce weekly sponsored “snack hack” videos published on my Instagram Story in collaboration with a local food delivery service, and provide weekly analytics reports to the brand's marketing manager.
Research local restaurants and create value-added content for daily Instagram Stories and Feed posts.
Account Representative ,

03/2019 to 05/2020
Company Name
— City , State
Developed campaign materials including social media plans with paid Twitter ads, program announcements, pitch letters, and satellite media tour alert copy for multiple Johnson & Johnson pharmaceutical brands. Created internal communications for Janssen, including daily media monitoring reports for C-suite executives, company-wide emails, LinkedIn articles published by leadership, training videos, and internal television slides
•Provided updates on running projects and set project-based goals in weekly client meetings.
Compiled research on pharmaceutical brands and their campaigns to find new business opportunities.
Management Trainee ,

06/2016 to 10/2018
Company Name
— City , State
Led operations of 4 Café departments concurrently, including overseeing 4 Team Leaders and 30+ employees.
Successfully planned and led Café operations for Super Bowl 2018 and Catering operations for Thanksgiving 2017, increasing sales 40% year-to-year and ranking #2 in the company for sales, respectively.
Trained 10+ managers and 50+ employees for 2 store openings and led teams for the first month of openings.
Human Resource and Recruiting Intern ,

01/2015 to 12/2015
Company Name
— City , State
Created and implemented social media network growth plans for 5 Financial Advisors via LinkedIn.
Secured over 10 interviews per week for Advisor candidates, via email marketing strategy that I curated.
Founded the Women in Finance Internship to drive recruitment of entry-level women Financial Advisors.
Developed and pitched grant and internship program proposals for non-profit and corporate funding, securing over $6k in funding.

<JD_START>
Job Title: Senior Account Executive, Public Relations

Location: Illinois, United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Finance, Public Relations

Description:
Role Summary:The Senior Account Executive that has a focus on media relations will independently lead $100-299K in retainer accounts or projects. The Senior Account Executive will manage multiple responsibilities including generating consistent media exposure for clients, supporting the development of key themes, campaign strategy, client relations and mentoring other members of the team. Financial experience in public relations is a must have for success in this role.
Responsibilities:Media Relations:Identifies and secures an array of media placements including high-profile and feature opportunities for clients across the teamDelegates tasks and helps with mentoring Account Coordinators, Account Executives, and interns Assists in the development of strategic PR plans and campaign development for team accounts they supportDevelops and maintains relationships with all media outlets including trades, broadcast, and national mediaDevelops unique story angles and timely pitches to generate consistent client exposureClient Service:Independently leads $100-299K in client account revenueServe as lead point of contact and run calls for the client accounts they are leadingDraft PR plans for the accounts they are leadingFunctions as a general point of contact (for clients and internally) for PR initiativesSupports the lead point of contact for other team client accountsParticipates in regular client update calls and meetings as well as new client discovery meetings for other team client accountsWriting:Reviews and edits company-generated content before sharing with clientsSupports in drafting press releases, award nominations, social media posts, and other client-related materials, when neededAdministrative Support:Assists internal team members with other clients, business development, and Company projectsReviews press reports before sending to clientsEnsures that the team has saved final versions to SharePoint and has scheduled press releases for distributionCompany Ambassador:Acts as a steward of the JConnelly brand, consistently representing and reflecting the Company’s core values, approach, and high standards of excellence in all client, media, and public interactions
Performs other duties as assigned
Education: College degree; or equivalent related business experience
Experience & Expertise:Minimum 3-5 years of successful industry-related experience with an emphasis on managing client relationshipsDemonstrated ability to organize/prioritize work, handle details accurately, follow up with minimum supervision, and complete tasks within specified deadlinesExcellent interpersonal, communication, problem-solving, and customer service skillsProficiency with various software applications including the full Office suite, as well as social media channelsProficiency in PR related software including but not limited to Cision, Meltwater, TrendKite, Sprout, Hootsuite, etc.Experience in financial aspects of public relations is required for this role.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
<JD_END>
